title: What Are Your Plans for Golden Week?
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>It’s Golden Week~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Are you planning to go somewhere, Kanata?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yeah, Kanata will go on a picnic with Haruka-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>You two are really good siblings, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Aren’t you going to go out with your sister too, Eli-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Hmm, maybe I should invite her too.... There’s a school idol live just around the corner, after all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Eh!? Really!? When!? Where!? If there’s a school idol live, Kanata also wants to take Haruka-chan there~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>C-, calm down, Kanata. Then, would the two of you like to go with us?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Eeeh!? Can we!? Yaaay~, it’s going to be a double date~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, that’s right. Let’s start making plans from now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
